name: New Home: Medieval Village
description:
New Home Medieval Village is a zoning-based medieval themed city building game. Create zoning areas according to the demands of the villagers and meet the needs of the villagers. Keep them happy with your service buildings and attract wealthier villagers to your village.

  • Customize buildings or create new ones by using building editor.

  • Create zoning areas according to demand.

  • Keep your village safe.

  • Provide villagers the resources they need.

  • Build schools and libraries to educate villagers.

  • Attract wealthier villagers to your village to create more advanced housing demands.
